```{r}
#This is a function you can run on a column to count the number of decimal 
# places represented:
count_decimals <- function(x) {
  ifelse(is.na(x), NA,
         nchar(sub("^[^.]*\\.?","", format(x, scientific = FALSE))))
}

#This is the line to make the number of decimal places a new column:
df$decimal_places <- count_decimals(df$column_of_curiosity)
```
